Summary: There was a bright light that was there during the twilight hours as I looked out my apartment window.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out my back sliding door at 7.00 and looked in the sky, there was a very bright light which was very interesting. It was a light which was about the size of a dime. The bright object appeared in front of a tree on a patio. The object was visible from my patio at the ten o'clock hour.There was blinking red lights, as one finds on a plane. It was very plane for a period of two hours or so and never moved. It was also interesting as the darkness came in it disappeared, and there was nothing there, and it was gone. I mentioned it to a friend, and they said they had seen it as well around the same time. I asked them to report it as well.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were 2 other sightings in Sacramento on or around September 27th 2005
